name: Chaye Kahaniyaan
description:
As mentioned before, it is a Dine n' Dash game which means customers will be coming in and we have to serve them as quickly as possible!

How to play:

  • Customers will put an order as Number of cups to be served
  • TAP and HOLD on the lower quarter of the screen to fill in the cups
  • The CUPS can be seen above the stall
  • When you RELEASE, player will move onto the next cup and you may now fill that
  • Once the requested number of cups are filled, you may TAP on the order/ table where the reqest came from to serve them
  • Be quick! Because there is a time limit on every order which can be seen by an orb on top of the order, shrinking smaller and smaller
  • Getting the orders right will give you points!
  • However getting them wrong will deplete your HP bar and once its down, Game's Over :(

Thats all! Your feedback will be much appreciated since this is still a prototype. Let us know of your experience playing this and let us know of any suggestions you may have! Thankyou~!
